summary: A young woman inherits a ranch that is supposedly haunted by a murderous beast called "The Chooper."
cast: Carolyn Brandt|Ron Haydock|Jason Wayne|Laurel Spring|John Bates|Steve Edwards|Linda Steckler|Laura Steckler|Peanuts the Pony
director: Director: Ray Dennis Steckler (as Wolfgang Schmidt)
title: Blood Shack
